translation.title: Attaining the Methods of Textual Analysis

segments.en: 86. Attaining the Methods of Textual Analysis

segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
segments.en: “A senior mendicant with five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.

segments.pli: Atthapaṭisambhidāpatto hoti, dhammapaṭisambhidāpatto hoti, niruttipaṭisambhidāpatto hoti, paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāpatto hoti,
segments.en: They have attained the textual analysis of meaning, text, terminology, and eloquence.

segments.pli: yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṃ uccāvacāni kiṃkaraṇīyāni tattha dakkho hoti analaso tatrupāyāya vīmaṃsāya samannāgato alaṃ kātuṃ alaṃ saṃvidhātuṃ—
segments.en: And they are skilled and tireless in a diverse spectrum of duties for their spiritual companions, understanding how to go about things in order to complete and organize the work.

segments.pli: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
segments.en: A senior mendicant with these five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.”

sections.title: “A senior mendicant with five qualities is dear and…

suttaplex.blurb: A senior mendicant is liked if they can analyze and explain the Dharma well, and if they are helpful in the monastery.
